verses.verse: וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> And afterward בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> went in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and told אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> Let my people וְיָחֹ֥גּוּ <WH2287> that they may hold a feast לִ֖י בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> unto me in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh מִ֤י <WH4310> Who יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Who [is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> that I should obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice לְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> to let Israel לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> ? I know אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> not the LORD וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> and besides אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> neither will I let Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֲשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <WH7971> go

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And they said אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> The God הָעִבְרִ֖ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣א <WH7122> hath met עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and נֵ֣לֲכָה <WH1980> go נָּ֡א <WH4994> Please דֶּרֶךְ֩ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> we pray thee three יָמִ֜ים <WH3117> days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> into the desert וְנִזְבְּחָה֙ <WH2076> and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God פֶּ֨ן־ <WH6435> otherwise יִפְגָּעֵ֔נוּ <WH6293> lest he fall בַּדֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> upon us with pestilence א֥וֹ <WH176> or בֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> or with the sword

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> But מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> why מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto them Wherefore do ye Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron תַּפְרִ֥יעוּ <WH6544> let אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people מִמַּֽעֲשָׂ֑יו <WH4639> act לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> to לְסִבְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5450> you unto your burdens

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh הֵן־ <WH2005> Look רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> now [are] many עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> are now עַ֣ם <WH5971> Behold the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהִשְׁבַּתֶּ֥ם <WH7673> and ye make them rest אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִסִּבְלֹתָֽם׃ <WH5450> from their burdens

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> commanded פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> the same אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֹּגְשִׂ֣ים <WH5065> the taskmasters בָּעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁטְרָ֖יו <WH7860> and their officers לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֹ֣א <WH3808> are no תֹאסִפ֞וּן <WH3254> Ye shall no more לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> give תֶּ֧בֶן <WH8401> straw לָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people לִלְבֹּ֥ן <WH3835> to make הַלְּבֵנִ֖ים <WH3843> brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <WH8032> before that time הֵ֚ם <WH1992> themselves יֵֽלְכ֔וּ <WH1980> go וְקֹשְׁשׁ֥וּ <WH7197> and gather לָהֶ֖ם תֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> straw

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַתְכֹּ֨נֶת <WH4971> And the tale הַלְּבֵנִ֜ים <WH3843> of the bricks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֵם֩ <WH1992> they עֹשִׂ֨ים <WH6213> which they did make תְּמ֤וֹל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֹׁם֙ <WH8032> before that time תָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> ye shall lay עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תִגְרְע֖וּ <WH1639> upon them ye shall not diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> any כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because נִרְפִּ֣ים <WH7503> [ought] thereof for they [be] idle הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that הֵ֤ם <WH1992> they צֹֽעֲקִים֙ <WH6817> therefore they cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <WH2076> [and] sacrifice לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> to our God

תִּכְבַּ֧ד <WH3513> be laid הָעֲבֹדָ֛ה <WH5656> Let there more work עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> the men וְיַעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> that they may labour בָ֑הּ וְאַל־ <WH408> no יִשְׁע֖וּ <WH8159> therein and let them not regard בְּדִבְרֵי־ <WH1697> words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> vain

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <WH3318> went out נֹגְשֵׂ֤י <WH5065> And the taskmasters הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people וְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <WH7860> and their officers וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> and they spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> to the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh אֵינֶ֛נִּי <WH369> I am not נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> I will not give לָכֶ֖ם תֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> you straw

אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> You לְכ֨וּ <WH1980> go קְח֤וּ <WH3947> ye get לָכֶם֙ תֶּ֔בֶן <WH8401> you straw מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> where תִּמְצָ֑אוּ <WH4672> ye can find כִּ֣י <WH3588> it yet אֵ֥ין <WH369> none נִגְרָ֛ע <WH1639> shall be diminished מֵעֲבֹדַתְכֶ֖ם <WH5656> of your work דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> not ought

וַיָּ֥פֶץ <WH6327> were scattered abroad הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> So the people בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH7197> to gather קַ֖שׁ <WH7179> stubble לַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> instead of straw

וְהַנֹּגְשִׂ֖ים <WH5065> And the taskmasters אָצִ֣ים <WH213> hasted לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> [them] saying כַּלּ֤וּ <WH3615> Fulfil מַעֲשֵׂיכֶם֙ <WH4639> your works דְּבַר־ <WH1697> tasks י֣וֹם <WH3117> [your] daily בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <WH3117> daily כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> you בִּהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> as when there was הַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <WH8401> straw

וַיֻּכּ֗וּ <WH5221> over them were beaten שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <WH7860> And the officers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שָׂ֣מוּ <WH7760> had set עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH5921> over נֹגְשֵׂ֥י <WH5065> taskmasters פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> which Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> [and] demanded מַדּ֡וּעַ <WH4069> Why לֹא֩ <WH3808> not כִלִּיתֶ֨ם <WH3615> Wherefore have ye not fulfilled חָקְכֶ֤ם <WH2706> your task לִלְבֹּן֙ <WH3835> in making brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <WH8543> both yesterday שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <WH8032> before that time גַּם־ <WH1571> either תְּמ֖וֹל <WH8543> yesterday גַּם־ <WH1571> or הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> and to day

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> came שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <WH7860> Then the officers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> and cried אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why תַעֲשֶׂ֦ה <WH6213> Wherefore dealest כֹ֖ה <WH3541> this לַעֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> bondage

תֶּ֗בֶן <WH8401> There is no straw אֵ֤ין <WH369> There נִתָּן֙ <WH5414> given לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants וּלְבֵנִ֛ים <WH3843> brick אֹמְרִ֥ים <WH559> and they say לָ֖נוּ עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> to us Make וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> behold עֲבָדֶ֛יךָ <WH5650> and behold thy servants מֻכִּ֖ים <WH5221> [are] beaten וְחָטָ֥את <WH2398> but the fault עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> [is] in thine own people

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> But he said נִרְפִּ֥ים <WH7503> Ye [are] idle אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you נִרְפִּ֑ים <WH7503> [ye are] idle עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> therefore ye say נֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <WH2076> [and] do sacrifice לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> to the LORD

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> go עִבְד֔וּ <WH5647> therefore now [and] work וְתֶ֖בֶן <WH8401> for there shall no straw לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִנָּתֵ֣ן <WH5414> be given לָכֶ֑ם וְתֹ֥כֶן <WH8506> the tale לְבֵנִ֖ים <WH3843> of bricks תִּתֵּֽנּוּ׃ <WH5414> you yet shall ye deliver

וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> did see שֹֽׁטְרֵ֧י <WH7860> And the officers בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּרָ֣ע <WH7451> [that] they [were] in evil לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> [case] after it was said לֹא־ <WH3808> must not תִגְרְע֥וּ <WH1639> Ye shall not minish מִלִּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3843> [ought] from your bricks דְּבַר־ <WH1697> task י֥וֹם <WH3117> daily בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> daily

וַֽיִּפְגְּעוּ֙ <WH6293> And they met אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and Aaron נִצָּבִ֖ים <WH5324> who stood לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <WH7125> in the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> as they came forth מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about יֵ֧רֶא <WH7200> look יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> unto them The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> upon וְיִשְׁפֹּ֑ט <WH8199> upon you and judge אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> to be הִבְאַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH887> to be abhorred אֶת־ <WH853> רֵיחֵ֗נוּ <WH7381> because ye have made our savour בְּעֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> in the eyes פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> and in the eyes עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> to put חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> a sword בְּיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> in their hand לְהָרְגֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2026> to slay

וַיָּ֧שָׁב <WH7725> returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> Lord לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> why הֲרֵעֹ֙תָה֙ <WH7489> wherefore hast thou [so] evil entreated לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> ever שְׁלַחְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH7971> send

וּמֵאָ֞ז <WH227> for בָּ֤אתִי <WH935> For since I came אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> to Pharaoh לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> to speak בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> in thy name הֵרַ֖ע <WH7489> he hath done evil לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וְהַצֵּ֥ל <WH5337> neither hast thou delivered לֹא־ <WH3808> at הִצַּ֖לְתָּ <WH5337> at all אֶת־ <WH853> עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> thy people
